organisationInformation.name: Kelkoo
organisationInformation.description: Price comparison shopping and travel website

dataProtectionOfficer.name: xNo name listed, only referred to as "him".

general.observations: Clear explanation to contact their DPO with questions about data processing.

access.observations: The right to access is clearly spelled out with it's own heading.

rectification.observations: The right to rectification is clearly spelled out with it's own heading.

erasure.observations: The right to delete personal information is clearly spelled out with it's own heading.

restrictProcessing.observations: The right to restrict processing is clearly spelled out with it's own heading.

dataPortability.observations: The right to data portability is clearly spelled out with it's own heading.

dataCategoriesCollected.observations:
They may collect personal financial information but are not specific (no mention of bank account details for example). They also list IP address specifically.

They define personal information as any information from which you "can be identified directly or indirectly". Perhaps a bit unclear what they mean by "indirectly."
dataCategoriesCollected.sourceText: “Personal Information” means any information about you which is personally identifiable which may include (but might not be limited to) your name, age, gender, location, telephone number, email address, IP address, financial details and any other information from which you can be identified directly or indirectly and which you may disclose to us or otherwise provide to us via the Website or elsewhere at any time.

thirdParties.observations: They mention no third parties by name.

retentionRules.summary: They keep your information as long as necessary for the purposes listed in "How do we use your personal information".
retentionRules.sourceText: We only hold Personal Information for as long as is necessary for the purposes described above in the paragraph headed “HOW DO WE USE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION?”

lawfulBases.consent:
- When you view or buy a product/service from a seller on Kelkoo
- When you make a complaint or enquiry
- When you give information to register for an account or give your contact details for an offer or prize
lawfulBases.observations: It is generally unclear under which lawful basis Kelkoo uses data.

securityStandards.observations: Nothing too specific (no mention of encryption or other security measures) beyond mention of "industry standard practices" and storing info on secure servers.

dataProcessingAddendum.observations: Personal information will not be transferred outside of the European Union.

complaintInformation.observations: They list their data processing authority but not specifically as a resource for complaints.
complaintInformation.sourceText:
Only address no email or phone number listed.

Commission Nationale Informatique et Libertés
